message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a chance to purchase this product. I think it would be incredibly beneficial for you. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $11,500.  What are your thoughts?

Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm! While I see the value in the product, $11,500 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with right now. I'm willing to pay $10,500. Would you be open to that?
Hi Bob, thanks for the offer.  I understand your perspective. How about we meet in the middle at $11,000? I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations and provide significant value.
